artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. White leather and/or vinyl, 3/8-1/2" wide, separated by 3 shots of white yarn. Stapled to 11x8/2" card. Light scrim on reverse. Slightly different than 99.1.1012.29. (black & white)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Leather Cloth%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1956
title: Leather Cloth
